uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.reader

Interface DataReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExampleSimpleDataReader, NullDataReader, SerialisedDataReader, SimpleDataReader

    public interface DataReader
    The core API for the data reader. The responsibility of the data reader is to connect to the requested resource, apply the rules, then passes back to the data service the stream of data in the expected format. There is a utility method Util.applyRules(java.util.stream.Stream, uk.gov.gchq.palisade.User, uk.gov.gchq.palisade.Justification, uk.gov.gchq.palisade.policy.Rules) that does the part of applying the rules provided your input data is in the format that the rules expect.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String _getClass() 
      default void _setClass(String className) 
      <RAW_DATA_TYPE,RULES_DATA_TYPE>
      DataReaderResponse<RAW_DATA_TYPE>      		 read(DataReaderRequest<RULES_DATA_TYPE> request)
      This method will read the data from a single resource and apply all the rules.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        <RAW_DATA_TYPE,RULES_DATA_TYPE> DataReaderResponse<RAW_DATA_TYPE> read(DataReaderRequest<RULES_DATA_TYPE> request)
        This method will read the data from a single resource and apply all the rules.
        Type Parameters:
        RAW_DATA_TYPE - Java class that the raw data is read in as and streamed back to the client as.
        RULES_DATA_TYPE - Java class that the rules expect the data to be in.
        Parameters:
        request - DataReaderRequest containing the resource to be read, rules to be applied, the user requesting the data and the justification for accessing the data.
        Returns:
        a DataReaderRequest that contains the stream of data.

      • _getClass
